  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int score, String name, int speedX, int speedY, Point location, GamePanel map, Image texture)
      Creates a Player with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      location - a point where Character is located
      texture - an Image that represents the Character
      speedX - speed on the x-axis
      speedY - speed on the y-axis
      map - game panel that the Character belongs
      name - a name that is given to this Player
      score - this Player's score

  • Method Details

    • check

      public boolean check()
      It checks if the player has collected all 10 regular rewards and the location of the rescue helicopter same as the player's location
      Returns:
      true if this Player collected all the regular rewards, otherwise returns false

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Accessors methods

    • setScore

      public void setScore(int score)
      Mutators methods

    • setCollection

      public void setCollection(int collection)

    • pickReward

      public ArrayList<Reward> pickReward(ArrayList<Reward> rl)
      If the player's locations is same as reward's location then it makes the player collect the reward. Increases the score of the player by the worth of the reward's value If the reward is regular reward then it increases the collection by 1 to keep the count of regulars.
      Parameters:
      rl - the list where all the rewards that have been created are kept
      Returns:
      the new modified list for the rewards

    • punishment

      public ArrayList<PunishmentRoadBlock> punishment(ArrayList<PunishmentRoadBlock> pl)
      If the location of the player same as the location of the punishment then it makes the players loose score by the worth of punishment's value
      Parameters:
      pl - the list where all the road blocks for punishment that have been created are kept
      Returns:
      the new modified list for the road blocks

    • caught

      public boolean caught(ArrayList<Enemy> el)
      It checks if this Player caught by the enemy or not
      Parameters:
      el - the list of enemies in the game
      Returns:
      true if this Player is in the same cell with the Enemy, otherwise false
